title: LILIA COLLAR NECKLACE, SILVER
description: The 15-inch Lilia Collar Necklace is meticulously crafted in sterling silver and features square-cut lab-grown white sapphires encircled by baguette and round sapphires, totaling 30.5 carats DEW.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: Prong set
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Square, baguette, and round-cut
 
15 inches, 495 stones, 30.5 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
